item.title: Opera singer delivers Joy to audiences | The Royal Gazette:Bermuda Arts & Entertainment
item.description:
Opera singer delivers Joy to audiences | The Royal Gazette:Bermuda Arts & Entertainment

Published Mar 14, 2016 at 8:00 am (Updated Mar 14, 2016 at 7:28 am) The back of singer Joy Barnum's neck often hurts after a performance. It's from laughing and smiling so much. She kicks the stereotype of a sombre, stern opera singer right to the kerb.
